mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO error_log (timestamp, type, message, stack, url, line, column, user_agent, user_id, doc_id, additional_info, create_time) VALUES
(#{errorLog.timestamp}, #{errorLog.type}, #{errorLog.message}, #{errorLog.stack}, #{errorLog.url}, #{errorLog.line}, #{errorLog.column}, #{errorLog.userAgent}, #{errorLog.userId}, #{errorLog.docId}, #{errorLog.additionalInfo}, #{errorLog.createTime})
